snippet: Sierra Leone appealed to the United States on Wednesday to send military aid to help it battle Ebola as it falls behind its West African neighbours Guinea and Liberia in the fight against the virus....

headline.print_headline: Sierra Leone Seeks U.S. Military Help to Fight Ebola
headline.main: Sierra Leone Seeks U.S. Military Help to Fight Ebola

lead_paragraph: Sierra Leone appealed to the United States on Wednesday to send military aid to help it battle Ebola as it falls behind its West African neighbours Guinea and Liberia in the fight against the virus.
